name: Me
text: Phew... I think we can catch our breath here.
We had escaped the restaurant, but the black market district was already filled with white mist and zombified inhabitants.
While avoiding the pesky Zombies, we had tumbled into a back alley away from the main street. The white mist had not reached this far.

name: Me
text: So, Yomi Akitsu was it? You're going to lead us to where Gaiza is?

name: Akitsu
text: Yes. That's the deal I have with Madam.

name: Me
text: Deal? You're not one of the underlings of that masked lady?

name: Akitsu
text: Huh!? Underling!? Don't be rude!
Akitsu's face turned into a mixture of contempt and exasperation.

name: Akitsu
text: I've just got a deal with her, you hear, a deal.

name: Akitsu
text: First and foremost, I'm a proud Ryomanin. There's no way I would be so pathetic as to work under someone else.

name: Me
text: A Ryomanin...?
Come to think of it, when Akitsu had rescued us, she had also called herself a Ryomanin.

name: Akitsu
text: Hmhmm. You're curious, aren't you? Of course you would be, huh.
Akitsu's face took on a proud look.

name: Akitsu
text: For you ninja of the human world? Taimanin? For you of course, it's a story that I'm sure you can't wait to hear and that you can't stop thinking aboutー

name: Me
text: No, we can leave it there.

name: Akitsu
text: Eh?

name: Me
text: For now, chasing Gaiza is our priority. Ryoma... what was it? Not sure, but let's talk about that later.

name: Akitsu
text: Eh? I-Is that so...? You're not curious...? You guys are ninja too, aren't you...?
This time Akitsu's expression turned into bewilderment. Unlike the impression she had given when she had been slicing Zombies in half, well, it seemed that she enjoyed talking.

name: Me
text: I can't say I'm that curious... Hebiko, Shikanosuke, what about you?

name: Hebiko
text: Hmmm. She has a lot of legs, but her fighting style is different from Hebiko.

name: Akitsu
text: These are not legs! This is called Magick Gear...
Akitsu rattled the four mechanical arms that sprouted from the mysterious piece of equipment.

name: Me
text: What about you, Shikanosuke?

name: Shikanosuke
text: Eh? What? Romanin? Is it a painkiller or something?

name: Akitsu
text: That's enough!

name: Akitsu
text: Even if you say you want to hear later, I won't tell you!!

name: Me
text: What, did you want us to ask about it?

name: Akitsu
text: N-No, I didn't!!! Isn't it obvious that I didn't? Why are all the ninja of the human world so...
Akitsu was still mumbling, but it was true that this was not the best time.

name: Me
text: So, about Gaiza's location.

name: Me
text: This guy stole the CD Virus, so he's most likely being hunted by several UFS organizations.

name: Me
text: He knows that, so he's probably hiding himself securely somewhere. Do you know where he's lying low?

name: Akitsu
text: No, I don't.

name: Me
text: Hey, then how...

name: Akitsu
text: We just have to use our techniques to follow him.

name: Me
text: Techniques...? Are you talking about Ninja Arts?
Did Akitsu also possess some kind of ninja power?

name: Akitsu
text: Hmph. You're not interested, right? Well, I'll start looking for him then.
Akitsu took out something that looked like a little machine and showed it to us.

name: Akitsu
text: Magick Gear: Shadow SpiderーHey you, you've got something Madam told you to bring, right? Give it to me.

name: Me
text: Yeah.
I pulled a faded pouch out from the bag on my back.

name: Me
text: There you go. Gym clothes should be fine?
On the phone the masked lady had ordered me to "bring something that Gaiza wore."
So I had brought Gaiza's gym clothes that had been left behind at school.

name: Akitsu
text: Gym clothes!? Gross... Well, doesn't matter as long as we can get the target's DNA.
While grumbling, Akitsu tore up Gaiza's gym clothes and threw them into an opening in the center of the machine.
And thenー

name: Shikanosuke
text: Eehh!? Wh-What is that!?

name: Hebiko
text: Little spider-chans are coming out of the machine!?
The machine's exterior crumbled away and turned into hundreds of mechanical spiders.
And then, with the sound of thousands of tiny mechanical legs, the spiders moved toward the main street.

name: Akitsu
text: Hm. Looks like they caught the scent right away. If we follow those little ones, we'll eventually catch up to our target.

name: Me
text: I see, that's awesome. So this is your Ninja Art...?

name: Akitsu
text: Y-Yeah!! What!? I knew it... you want to hear about Ryomanin!?

name: Me
text: No, we can do that later. More importantly, let's follow those spiders. If we lose sight of them, we have nothing.

name: Akitsu
text: Ahh, jeez!! I know that!!
Akitsu pouted, puffed out her cheeks, and chased after the mechanical spiders.

name: Shikanosuke
text: Fuma! Let's go too!

name: Me
text: Yeah!
